```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(here)
library(tidytext)
library(tidyverse)
```

Download data zip file from here: https://github.com/MaRo406/EDS-231-text-sentiment/blob/main/data/SB_stories.zip
Unzip into a convenient location, ex. /data/Spring-Break-Stories
```{r}
#list.files is base r to list files in dir/folder
#we use map()  to apply a function to each element of a vector or list
tbl <- list.files(here("class", "data", "SB_stories"), pattern = "*.txt") %>% 
  map_chr(~read_file(here("class/data/SB_stories", .)))%>% #{purr}, {readr}
  tibble(text = .)


```


```{r unnest_tokens}

text_words <- tbl %>% 
  unnest_tokens(word, text)
```

```{r word_frequency_plot}

text_words %>% 
  count(word, sort = TRUE) %>%  #sort by frequency
  filter(n > 100) %>% 
  mutate(word = reorder(word, n)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(n, word)) +
  geom_col()
```

```{r stop-words}
#plot again as above

text_words <- text_words %>% 
  anti_join(stop_words)

text_words %>% 
  count(word, sort = TRUE) %>%  #sort by frequency
  filter(n > 50) %>% 
  mutate(word = reorder(word, n)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(n, word)) +
  geom_col()
```

```{r get_bing}

bing_sent <- get_sentiments('bing')

head(bing_sent)

```

```{r join_bing}

text_words %>% 
  inner_join(bing_sent, by = "word")

```

```{r nrc_lex}

nrc_sent <- get_sentiments("nrc")

nrc_joy <- nrc_sent %>% 
  filter(sentiment == "joy")
  

text_words %>% 
  inner_join(nrc_joy) %>% 
  count(word, sort = TRUE)

```
